name: insouciantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a relaxed and happy way, without any sign that you feel worried or guilty: She answered all of the journalists' questions calmly and insouciantly. Later that night I spotted a fox skipping insouciantly along the pavement.
More examplesFewer examplesHe strolled along with his jacket thrown insouciantly over his shoulder.She told me quite insouciantly that she had once been arrested for assaulting a police officer.She walked along the beach with a pair of designer sunglasses perched insouciantly on her forehead.
